import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Context } from '../../contexts/Context'; import "../home/css/Menu.css" function Menu() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); var adminUser = []; const getUser = localStorage.getItem('ten@key'); if (getUser === "admin") { adminUser.push(
Admin
) } const clearLogin = () => { localStorage.removeItem('ten@key'); window.location.reload(false); window.location.assign('http://localhost:3000/login'); } useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { await axios('http://localhost:8080/category') .then(result => { setData(result.data); }, (err) => { console.log(err); }) }; fetchData(); }, []) const { cart } = useContext(Context) return ( <> {/*
  • Điện thoại
      {data.map((item, i) => { return (
    • {item.name}
      • ) })}
  • Laptop
  • Tablet
  • Phụ kiện
  • Hỗ Trợ
  • {adminUser}
  • {cart.length}
  • {getUser}
*/}

); } export default Menu;
